text_block_list.text: The weather forecast had been wrong and it was pouring with rain. I was in the office, throwing together an indoor training plan for the day…
It felt like I'd been losing things a lot recently. The pen today. Those papers from the academy yesterday…
I got up to get another one… when…
(bonk!!)
A sudden shove, like someone was trying to push me over… but there was no one in the room but me…
No time to worry about that now though. A trainer can't keep their Uma Musume waiting! I gave myself a quick pep-talk, and got to work.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Um…… trainer-san… …the music's stopped…
(I'd put on some music to help her tempo while she ran laps of the gym. When had it stopped? I hadn't even noticed…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Um… trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No… it's fine, but…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Recently, have you noticed anything… unusual… happening?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: If not… that's fine…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Shall we… finish for today…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Understood. I'm going to stay here a while longer.
choice_data_list: If you want to keep training, I'll stay too.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: That… won't be necessary… You… should go home…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Straight home. Don't stop. And…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: For the time being… please don't come down to the track at night…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You must not visit me… at night…
When I got outside, the rain had stopped. As I walked home, I thought back on what Manhattan Cafe had said.
Maybe she was mad at me for messing up earlier. "I've got to do better tomorrow" I told myself, when…
Suddenly a chill run down my back… I was being watched…
I turned back to look, but there was nothing but darkness. Darkness… and the unmistakable sense that someone was right behind me…!
Um…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I had one more thing to tell you…
choice_data_list: Y… y…… you frightened the life out of me!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Sorry. I didn't mean to.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I just wanted to say… take care. So…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Until tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: As I thought… it's not me they want… it's trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But why? What don't they like about him? Or… could it be…
